author: Paul Rankin
method: Heat the oil in a pan and add the spinach and garlic. Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the spinach has wilted.  Stir in the cooked mashed potato and cook for a further 3-4 minutes, or until warmed through. Serve.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  2 handfuls fresh spinach,  2 garlic cloves, chopped,  200g/7oz ready-made mashed potato
